mapper.insert: insert into member_action (action_id, member_id, status, before_emotion, before_emotion_time, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) values (#{actionId}, #{memberId}, '진행중', #{beforeEmotion}, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'HH24'), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '행동 진행', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '행동 진행')
mapper.select: select member_action_id, action_id, member_id, status, before_emotion, after_emotion from member_action where member_action_id = (select max(member_action_id) from member_action)
mapper.update: update member_action set status='완료', after_emotion=#{updateParam.afterEmotion}, after_emotion_time=TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'HH24'), updated_at=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_by='행동 완료' where member_action_id = #{memberActionId}
